# plugins.autorestart

```lua
local autorestart = require "plugins.autorestart"
```

## config.plugins.autorestart

Configuration options for `autorestart` plugin.

### reload_type

```lua
(field) reload_type: "ask"|"reload"|"restart"
```

The type of reload to perform.
